heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_tiny
heroes.bio_loc: Coming to life as a chunk of stone, Tiny's origins are a mystery on which he continually speculates.  He is a Stone Giant now, but what did he used to be?  A splinter broken from a Golem's heel?  A shard swept from a gargoyle-sculptor's workshop?  A fragment of the Oracular Visage of Garthos?  A deep curiosity drives him, and he travels the world tirelessly seeking his origins, his parentage, his people.  As he roams, he gathers weight and size; the forces that weather lesser rocks, instead cause Tiny to grow and ever grow.
heroes.hype_loc: Growing to tremendous size and strength as the battle progresses, Tiny's power can quickly become terrifying. He tosses heroes and creeps at his enemies, or stuns them beneath an avalanche. Should he gather his full strength, he can demolish the enemy's base with ease.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues

facets.description_loc: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength.
facets.name: tiny_insurmountable

abilities.name: tiny_avalanche
abilities.desc_loc: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does %toss_damage_bonus_pct%%% bonus damage to units being tossed.
abilities.lore_loc: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

abilities.name: tiny_toss
abilities.desc_loc: Grabs the nearest unit in a %grab_radius% radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
abilities.lore_loc: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
notes_loc: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
Debuff Immune units can be targeted but cannot be tossed.
facets_loc: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss destination.

abilities.name: tiny_tree_grab
abilities.desc_loc: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
abilities.lore_loc: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
notes_loc: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

abilities.name: tiny_tree_channel
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
abilities.lore_loc: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

abilities.name: tiny_craggy_exterior
abilities.desc_loc: Enemies that attack Tiny receive a stacking debuff that lowers their attack damage with each stack.

abilities.name: tiny_grow
abilities.desc_loc: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, movement speed and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
abilities.lore_loc: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

abilities.name: tiny_toss_tree
abilities.desc_loc: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
abilities.lore_loc: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by %bonus_bonus_damage%.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_tiny_5
talents.desc_loc: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.

abilities.name: tiny_insurmountable
abilities.desc_loc: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength.
